post.body:
I've had to start over. Wiped the zerocat.eu proxy clean. Wiped my own Zeronet client folder clean, as it used to be a proxy, too. 

All of my old seeded movies are gone.. but at least it's good to know that enough people are seeding them, anyway.

ZeroNet comes with a steep learning curve. It's a brave, new world .. after all. I underestimated the amount of kiddy porn that may have potentially been lurking around.. as much as I overestimated the moral stamina of the average ZeroNet user.

Fuck kiddy porn. Pedophiles should just draw anime, and whack off to that instead. I have nothing against anime. Anime is great

@krixano - I just saw the routing tutorial you posted, and wanted to say thanks - this should save a lot of time and effort. It's also something I feel should be included in the Zeronet docs and packages.

btw - does this work on any zeroframe, or only the zeroframes usedin e.g. zeroup, zerome, etc?

p.s. I'll be sure to include your username in the credits for KopyKate BIG 0.2.0 :)

**The official ZeroFrame Routing Tutorial - by Krixano**

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/

Mission accomplished! :)
http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1513510645_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGNRLFcE

Successful reverse-engineering of ZeroMe and ZeroUp's Dynamic page routing system. Tutorial will be available soon, and will include Zeroframe.coffee and other source files. *Back*, *Forward* buttons both work.

Dynamically generated pages simply load faster, especially on mobile.. and are easier on the eye.

Now that I think about it .. I've wasted my past 10 years trying to be a Normie. 

It was a futile attempt at re-inventing myself; trying to undo all of the 'damage' that had accumulated over time .. as a result of me spending all evening after school on my PC playing Warcraft III, modding games, making virtual friends on online forums, etc.

I've even spent the last 3 years going to bars in the weekends. I've learned how to make people laugh. How to strike up conversations. How to have a lame one night stand. I've tried Tinder..

..Yet none of it ever translated into what I've always been looking for; a meaningful, lasting relationship.. with someone I don't have to try too hard to impress all the time.

Even my nerdiest of friends are now in a couple. Even crossdressers ... drag-queens full of tattoos and piercings can find love. How did they do it.. and why can't I do what they did?

Maybe a normal life just isn't worth pursuing. Maybe the forces at play are trying to protect me from something. I don't believe in a literal god, but certain aspects of the universe have a tendency to follow a certain set of rules.  

I'd run out of fucks to give, a long time ago. I'm going back to being the kid I've always been in primary school; always happy, so long as I could use my PC.

The scroll on my mouse was annoying the crap out of me.. constantly slipping away for no reason.

This video saved my life. I didn't have isopropyl alcohol.. so I just used sodium percarbonate and water, my homebrewing sterilizer. Seems to have solved the issue.. after drying off and a good scroll.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=981KfZez7Ws
